mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id userId,u.name,u.company_id compName FROM EW1_USER u WHERE u.user_id = #{name} and u.password = #{password} and status=1
SELECT role_id FROM EW1_USER_ROLES_RELATION WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}
SELECT r.role_name FROM EW1_USER_ROLES_RELATION ur,EW1_ROLES r WHERE ur.USER_ID=#{userId} AND ur.role_id = r.id
SELECT u.user_id,u.name,u.sex,u.position,u.status,u.company_id FROM EW1_USER u LEFT JOIN EW1_COMPANY c ON u.company_id = c.id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.user_id userId,u.name,u.password,u.sex,u.position,u.company_id,c.name compName,r.role_name roleName,u.status FROM EW1_USER u LEFT JOIN EW1_COMPANY c ON u.company_id = c.id LEFT JOIN EW1_USER_ROLES_RELATION ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN EW1_ROLES r ON r.id = ur.role_id
